com.blockhaus2000.util

Class CommandRegistrationUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an util class to facilitate the command registration.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCommands

        public static void registerCommands(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                    java.lang.Object obj,
                    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Registers all commands in the given Class with the given Object for the given Plugin.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class where the commands are placed.
        obj - An Object of the Class where the commands are placed (only for non-static methods, can be null ).
        plugin - The Plugin that is associated with the commands.
        See Also:
        CommandManager.register(Class, Object), DynamicPluginCommandManager.register(java.util.Collection)

      • registerCommands

        public static void registerCommands(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Registers commands. Will call registerCommands(Class, Object, Plugin) with obj = null.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Class where the commands are placed.
        plugin - The Plugin that is associated with the commands.
        See Also:
        registerCommands(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Object, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)

      • registerCommands

        public static void registerCommands(java.lang.Object obj,
                    org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
        Registers commands. Will call registerCommands(Class, Object, Plugin) with the Class of the given Object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The Object where the commands are placed.
        plugin - The Plugin that is associated with the commands.
        See Also:
        registerCommands(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Object, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin)
